page.title: 05Events 1985 in Hale
page.content: The main event in the{Summer}at Hale is the{Carnival.}It is a large Carnival where you see people dressed up sitting on decorated floats. The carnival runs through Hale and ends up at the recreation ground. In{Autumn}the main event is the {Fete}run by the Scout Troop on the recreation ground. There are refreshments and many other stalls and even an obstacle course. {Christmas}brings the{carol singing on the recreation ground where at least 150 people gather each year to sing their carols and drink soup and eat rolls. In{Spring}is the{pram race}where participants dress up in fancy dress and race around Hale going to every pub. They drink a pint at every pub to raise money for charity.
